Detailed Description

The trifocal tensor.

A class to hold a Trifocal Tensor and perform common operations, such as point and line transfer, coordinate-frame transformation and I/O.

Author:
Paul Beardsley, 29.03.96 Oxford University, UK
    Modifications:
     AWF - Added composition, transformation, homography generation.
     Peter Vanroose - 11 Mar 97 - added operator==
     Peter Vanroose - 22 Jun 03 - added vgl interface
